title: Stock Futures Gain Ahead of Fed Meeting
sub_head: Meme-stocks GameStop and AMC Entertainment fall premarket
body:
U.S. stock futures edged up ahead of the Federal Reserveâ€™s two-day policy meeting, which is expected to end with the central bank signaling a faster wind-down of its bond-buying program.
Futures for the S&P 500 rose 0.3% Tuesday. The index fell Monday, pulling the gauge back from a record high notched last week. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 gained 0.2% Tuesday, and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average added 0.3%.
